field_intro.value: Some notes of thanks to some great folks, without whom this site would not have been built (or my mortgage paid).

body.value:
Thanks to everyone who makes open source code and/or supports open source in any way. You are great.

This site was built on open source technologies, such as:

  • CMS: Drupal
    • PHP
    • Symfony
    • Twig
    • Composer
  • Frontend:
    • PatternLab (for last few version of this site)
    • GatsbyJS (for current version of this site)
    • Javascript
    • Node + NPM
    • Gulp
    • Sass
  • Development/ Hosting: Docker/LAMP
    • Docker
    • Docksal
    • Linux
    • Apache
    • MySQL
    • PHP
    • GitHub Pages
    • GitHub Actions
